articles.description: BTC ETF Flows: +$295m. ETF inflows fight German selling, BTC unchanged. German government sells $900m BTC, moves more. Rate of sales implies German supply sold this week. ETH ETFs set to launch next week. Election may affect SOL ETF decision March 2025. Raydium beats ETH for 24hr fees. BTC ‘power law’ points to 300% gain by 2025. BTC in 80 day post-halving re-accumulation phase. BlackRock treasury fund hits $500m. Republicans release pro-crypto policy. Senate urges blockchain tests for national security. Drop in BTC mining difficulty ‘comparable to FTX’. MetaMask introduces delegation toolkit. 25 major projects to launch tokens in H2 2025.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 154 - THE CELEBS ARE BACK...

articles.description: BTC sinks 5% then bounces back to unchanged. $58-60k the main area for ‘shorts to defend’. Crypto funds saw $441m inflows last week. German government transfers 1000 BTC to sell. Crypto sentiment at lowest in over a year. ETH spot premium hits local highs. Japanese firm Metaplanet buys $2.5m BTC. Expect more miners merging: TeraWulf CEO. SOL Firedancer bug bounty goes live. GLM transfers $117m of ETH treasury to exchanges. 98% of coins have topped this cycle: Kang. ETH ETF should come in next 2 weeks: Geraci. Crypto progress disheartening: Copeland.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 153 - A WEAK WEEKEND

articles.description: BTC hits $54k, set for worst week in over year. Mt. Gox begins to move BTC & make distributions. German government continues to sell holdings. Worst day for BTC liquidations since FTX. Justin Sun says he is willing to buy German BTC. German MP calls on it to stop selling BTC. $52k super-trend support line eyed for BTC. Funding rates turn extremely negative across majors. Only 6 mining machines profitable below $56k. Coinbase spot buyers emerge to counter drop. Total3 hits RSI lows only hit 4 times in last 4 years. Fear & Greed index hits lowest since Jan 2023. Capo remains bullish. Real selling begins at $38k: Schiff. Coinbase continue to fight for Gensler’s emails. Circle mints $250m USDC on SOL. Symbiotic hits $1bn TVL. Taiwan Mobile may open crypto exchange. Unisat completes funding round with Binance.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 152 - JOINED BY DEEZE!

articles.description: BTC ETF Flows: -$14m. BTC drops to $60k, CME gap filed again. $1bn shorts liquidated if we rally to $62.6k. Pump(.)fun surpasses ETH for revenue. ETH will outperform BTC after ETF launch: K33. ETH ETF may be delayed even further. BTC heading to $150k: Fundstrat. Chainlink & Fidelity partner for fund data on-chain. USDC protects the dollar: Circle ad. Robinhood considers crypto futures in US & EU. Another BTC miner looks to IPO in US. Vitalik bullish on prediction markets. Sentient Labs raises $85m for AI on SOL. Mantra to tokenise $500m of real estate. TAO falls 15% after security breach. Crypto scams & hacks hit $572m in Q2.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 151 - BTC TAPS THE 60K LINE

articles.description: BTC ETF inflows hit highest in a month. ETH ETF inflows to hit $5bn in 6 months: Gemini. ETH public funds see largest outflow since 2022. SOL hits new ATH for monthly economic value. Sellers starting to look exhausted: Crypto Quant. Silvergate sued by SEC, settles for $63m. Circle gets stablecoin license for USDC in EU. US DoJ ironically chooses Coinbase for custody. Bitcoin miner aims for $16bn IPO. Bitfarms increases BTC mining amid takeover attempt. DOT has 2 year runway amid large burn. DOT ecosystem builders turn against team. PENDLE TVL falls $3bn as restaking rewards end. PayPal stablecoin goes live on Jupiter. At least $600m altcoin unlocks this month.
articles.title: FOMO HOUR 150 - BILLY TO A BILLY?

articles.description: BTC bounces back above $61k after nosedive. SOL leads majors, BTC dominance falls. BTC RSI hit 18, largest net selling day in over a year. $174m ETF outflow led by GBTC. German government sells $24m more more BTC. Mt Gox info probably ‘leaked to insiders’. Mr 100 buys dip for first time in 34 days. SOL leads Moonpay transactions for 5th week. Trump may speak at Bitcoin Nashville. Biden rehires crypto advisor. Crypto & AI complement each other: Balaji. Bitcoin will protect AI’s wealth: Pomp. Tether stops minting on Algorand & EOS. Jupiter launches v3 swaps. ETH Foundation mailing list gets leaked. Jump CEO resigns after CFTC investigation. 54% of Japanese institutional investors want BTC. Strike launches in UK. MiCA approved EUR stablecoins coming in 6 days.

articles.description:
In an effort to fulfil its goal to advance the global educational sector, the FLOKI team has disclosed that building schools in the aforementioned nations was just the beginning of its vision to provide high-level academic opportunities in underprivileged nations.
 
The team behind doggy-themed meme coin and Shiba Inu competitor, Floki (FLOKI) has unveiled plans to build a school in India, taking a proactive step towards leveraging blockchain technology to facilitate its philanthropic efforts. 
 
Floki To Build A New School In India
 
On June 9, the Floki team announced a new initiative to build a school in India on X (formerly Twitter). Expressing excitement for the project, the Floki team disclosed that its school development plans in India were a positive step towards revolutionizing th…
articles.title: Shiba Inu Competitor FLOKI Pushes The Envelope With Promise To Build Schools In India

articles.description: The coming years are crucial for compliance and risk in crypto. Beth Haddock discusses strategies advisors can take to protect their brand while serving clients as fiduciaries.
articles.title: Crypto for Advisors: Crypto and Compliance

articles.author: Ronaldo Marquez
articles.description:
In what could be a major victory for stablecoin issuance and regulation in the US, the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has decided to drop its investigation into Paxos, providing a major boost to the stablecoin sector. 
 
According to a Fortune report on the matter, the decision was communicated to Paxos by Jorge Tenreiro, acting chief of the SEC’s crypto assets unit, and comes more than a year after the regulator sent a Wells notice to the New York-based institution, indicating a possible enforcement action over the Binance USD, or commonly known as BUSD, stablecoin, which Paxos developed in partnership with Binance.
 
Paxos Emerges From Year-Long Wells Notice Shadow
 
Per the report, Walter Hessert, Paxos’ head of strategy, expressed relief at the termination of the investigatio…
articles.title: BREAKING: SEC Drops Paxos Probe, Validates BUSD Non-Security Status

articles.author: Bitcoin.com
articles.description: The Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has decided to end its investigation into Paxos, a New York-based issuer of stablecoins, suggesting that stablecoins may not be treated as securities in most cases. This decision comes more than a year after the SEC sent Paxos a Wells Notice concerning the BUSD stablecoin, which is backed by […]
articles.title: SEC Withdraws Enforcement Action Against Paxos’ BUSD Stablecoin

articles.author: Tareq Sikder
articles.description:
Nuvei Corporation, a Canadian fintech company, announced a  
partnership with Mastercard today. This partnership will launch a new  
off-ramping solution in Europe. The solution allows consumers to convert their  
digital assets, including cryptocurrencies, into traditional fiat currency.  
They can do this using debit, credit, and prepaid cards.
Digital Finance Bridge 
This new function bridges digital and traditional finance.  
Consumers can spend their converted funds through Mastercard's global network.  
The off-ramping solution is part of Nuvei's modular payment platform. It aims  
to offer a simple and secure user experience.
Consumers can convert a wide range of supported digital  
assets into fiat currency. They can then transfer the funds to their eligible  
Mastercard in near re…
articles.title: Nuvei Partners with Mastercard: Crypto-to-Fiat Transfers and Global Use

articles.author: Jamie Redman
articles.description: The U.S. consumer price index (CPI) fell by 0.1% in June. The decline, primarily due to reduced gasoline prices, brought the annual inflation rate to its lowest in over three years. This news comes after U.S. President Joe Biden was accused of tapping into gasoline reserves ahead of the election to gain favor with voters. […]
articles.title: US Inflation Eases With 0.1% Drop in June; Biden Faces Gas Reserve Accusations

articles.description: On-chain games that establish a community-driven governance model, where players actively participate in decision-making, provide real ownership and accountability to the gaming community, says Ben Rubin, CEO & co-founder, Towns.
articles.title: From Coin-Operated Machines to Token-Operated Gaming

articles.author: George Kaloudis
articles.description: AI's utility is more obvious to everyday people than crypto's, and AI's risks are so much greater that power consumption fears seem beside the point.
articles.title: Why AI's Energy Use Isn't Demonized Like Bitcoin's
